column7: You're ready for those stray Bludgers now! You made it to the goal post! Next time pick up the Quaffle first. 20 points to Ravenclaw!
You made it to the goal post! Next time pick up the Quaffle first. You're ready for those stray Bludgers now! 20 points to Hufflepuff!
10 points to Slytherin. Thanks for playing!
